name: Breakfast for an Astrobotanist
description:
Another morning in space. As the resident astrobotanist, before you're able to head to the cafeteria for breakfast, you'll have to feed the man-sized plants! Using the station-provided SuperGro Arboreal Growth Hormone capsules, make sure all the plants have something to eat this morning. Try to only use what you need - that stuff isn't cheap! This is a simple point-to-throw physics game.

Controls: Click with the mouse to select menu buttons, and to throw food.

This game was made over the week of 9/20/2020, as the second in my deck of many games, where I try to make a game a week, every week, for a year.
